org.prebake.os
Interface OperatingSystem

All Known Implementing Classes:
RealOperatingSystem
@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public interface OperatingSystem

Abstraction over ProcessBuilder to ease testing.

Method Detail

run

OsProcess run(java.nio.file.Path cwd,
              java.lang.String command,
              java.lang.String... argv)
Parameters:
cwd - the working directory for the process.
command - e.g. "cp".
argv - the arguments to the command, e.g. fromfile.txt, tofile.txt.

getTempDir

java.nio.file.Path getTempDir()
A path to a directory where temporary files and directories can be put. It should be on a mount that has enough space to mirror large chunks of the client directory.

Normally, this is the directory named in the System property java.io.tmpdir.

getPipeFlusher

PipeFlusher getPipeFlusher()
Manages piping data between processes.
